name: Sorrel-Wrapped Shad
keywords: dry white wine, fish, lemon juice, shad, sorrel, main course, spring
recipeIngredient: 1 2-to-3-pound shad, scaled and cleaned, head and tail intact
2 pounds sorrel, well rinsed, stems removed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees. Season the shad inside and out with the salt and pepper. Place 1/3 of the sorrel in the bottom of the baking dish. Lay the shad on top and drape the remaining leaves over the fish, tucking in the edges so the fish is completely covered. Add the wine and lemon juice. Cover with foil and bake for 8 to 10 hours, basting every 2 hours. Serve immediately.
